explains: v. 继续存在，持续；坚持，执意；坚持说，反复说

sentences.en: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
sentences.cn: 需要宗教解答的生命问题持续存在着。

sentences.en: He urged the United States to persist with its efforts to bring about peace.
sentences.cn: 他敦促美国坚持努力实现和平。

sentences.en: I will persist until I succeed.
sentences.cn: 我会坚持不懈，直到成功。
